name: breathlessly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows someone is unable to breathe easily, or that makes you unable to breathe easily: He ran breathlessly into the house and burst into the room without knocking. Inside the tent it was breathlessly hot.
in a way that shows or expresses great excitement or nervousness: They waited breathlessly for the arrival of the Prince. Voters aren't breathlessly watching every report coming out of Washington. See
breathless
More examplesFewer examplesPanting breathlessly, she turned from the door and moved through to the hall.At five minutes to eight, he rushed breathlessly into the station.One girl breathlessly reports that she has seen another child climbing on the roof.
